name: Farms
description: Farms, stores Tangle farm information, provides farm reward withdrawals, and provides information on farms. Gives farm information, reward withdrawal access, reward estimation, controls farm parameters, and stores farm data.

functionDecorators.name: availableRewards
functionDecorators.description: Gets available rewards from one specifc farm.

parameterDecorators.name: address_
parameterDecorators.description: The address whose reward info will be returned.

parameterDecorators.name: name
parameterDecorators.description: The name of the farm whose rewards will be returned.

returnDecorators.description: The specified addresses' available rewards from the specified farm.

functionDecorators.name: availableRewards
functionDecorators.description: Gets all available rewards from all farms.

parameterDecorators.name: address_
parameterDecorators.description: The address whose rewards info will be returned.

functionDecorators.name: farms
functionDecorators.description: Gets all farms and their details.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawRewards
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw rewards from a specific yield farm for an address.

parameterDecorators.name: _address
parameterDecorators.description: The address whose rewards will be withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: name
parameterDecorators.description: The farm the rewards will be withdrawn from.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawRewards
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw rewards from all yield farms for an address.

parameterDecorators.name: _address
parameterDecorators.description: The address whose rewards will be withdrawn.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawRewards
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw rewards from a list of specified yield farms for an address.

parameterDecorators.name: _address
parameterDecorators.description: The address whose rewards will be withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: names
parameterDecorators.description: The farms the rewards will be withdrawn from.
